hostDetails.about: Chezmoihomes offers exclusive apartment in Granada center

listing.description:
Located in an emblematic building right in one of the most beautiful and hustle and bustle squares, Puerta Real, this stylish two bedroom apartment boasts the best situation in the center of Granada. 
The Cathedral or the Alhambra are only a short walk away.
The apartment has been decorated and furnished in a unique and elegant style. The apartment itself  is full of caracter with such a great attention to detail.

sorted_reviews.comments: Fabulous accommodation in central Granada. Host was not only a professional manager but eager to share personal knowledge of town. Recommendation for dinner was excellent. Apt has toys for kids our three year old was so happy!
This apartment was centrally located to everywhere you wanted to go. Gloria is the best host you can ask for. She is polite and attentive. I highly recommend booking.

Great central location close to lots of restaurants and bars and only a 5 minute walk to the Cathedral or to the Plaza Nueva and then up into the Albaicin if that's where you want to go. Gloria is a very friendly and helpful host also.

The apartment is great with balcony views out onto a large square, complete with fountain. The square is busy (great for people watching) but the apartment is quiet, and stylish, inside. There are lots of lovely things to look at in the display cases in the living room, a piano to play in the hallway, and COMFORTABLE beds in the bedrooms. We were guided in by Gloria and met at the apartment by Martin who was charming and welcoming. There was a delicious bottle of wine waiting for us, and lots of recommendations from Gloria for good places to eat and visit. The square is the perfect location from which to explore all of the attractions Granada has to offer, which we did on foot, except for one bus journey which we made more out of curiosity than necessity. We met with Gloria before leaving town - she is just great, brimming with enthusiasm and ultra keen that her guests have the best time possible. Gloria was very proactive before we arrived, she offered to help with tickets for transport and attractions and was able to help with translating an email we had from a booking we had made ourselves. I would definitely recommend staying at one of her properties - she is a genuine super host.

phrases.business_travel.business_travel_ready.mo: What are Business Travel Ready listings?
The whole home or apartment is yours.
Listings are reviewed by the community for cleanliness and accuracy. No smoking or pets allowed.
Hosts allow instant book or have a track record of responding within the first 24 hours.
Hosts don’t cancel confirmed reservations within 7 days of the check-in date.
You can check-in and check-out by yourself, 24-hours a day.
The space has fast wifi, a laptop-friendly workspace, and essentials like an iron, hangers, a hairdryer, and shampoo.
Questions? %{mail_anchor_start}Email us%{mail_anchor_end} or visit %{terms_anchor_start}Business Travel Ready Terms%{terms_anchor_end}
Add your work email to your profile
We just sent a verification email to %{email}.
phrases.business_travel_reward.modal.title: Business Travel Reward
phrases.business_travel_reward.modal.earn_credit: Earn Airbnb credit by saving money on business trips
phrases.business_travel_reward.modal.rewards_rul: If you spend less than %{company_name}’s budget, you’ll earn %{percentage}% of the savings in Airbnb credit.
phrases.business_travel_reward.modal.split_betwe: *Credit will be split evenly among guests from your company.

phrases.Hosts home is usually around X per night: %{host_first_name}’s home is usually around %{price_per_night} per night.
phrases.How we determined the average nightly pr: We looked at %{host_first_name}’s recent bookings around your travel dates to determine the average nightly price. This price excludes applicable fees and taxes.

phrases.p3.deposit modal message about eligibili: When you use a credit card or PayPal to book an eligible reservation, you’ll have the option to pay part of the total now, and the remaining amount closer to the check-in date.%{line_break}%{line_break}You won’t be charged additional fees for choosing this option.%{line_break}%{line_break}%{bold_start}What happens on the day of my second payment?%{bold_end}No action is required from you. On the second payment due date, we’ll automatically charge the payment method you used to reserve the booking for the initial payment.%{line_break}%{line_break}If there are any problems with this payment, we’ll send you an email update. If we are unable to collect the remaining balance, we will cancel the reservation on your behalf and you will be refunded based on the host’s cancellation policy.

phrases.messaging.test_inquiry.message:
This is a test inquiry from your mentor, %{first_name}. When you receive a real booking inquiry, it will look like this. Successful hosts—like Superhosts—usually respond to these inquiries within 24 hours.
When you get messages from your guests, pre-approving can help secure the booking. You can practice this feature by pre-approving this test inquiry.

phrases.messaging.test_inquiry.respond_quickly: Successful hosts—like Superhosts—usually respond to inquiries within 24 hours.

phrases.messaging.china_radical_transparency: When you message the host of a listing in China, your first name, profile picture, and messages with the host will be transferred to, stored, and processed by Airbnb China. Like all businesses operating in China, we need to comply with local laws and regulations, including privacy and information disclosure laws. %{link_start}Learn more%{link_end}.

phrases.airlock.title: Security Check
phrases.airlock.multi_friction_selection.title: Help us keep your account secure
phrases.airlock.multi_friction_selection.descrip: We want to confirm that it’s really you who’s trying to access your account. Please select one of the following ways to verify yourself.
phrases.airlock.multi_friction_selection.aov onl: To protect your account, we'll send a security code to your email or phone. This helps us make sure it's really you.
phrases.airlock.multi_friction_selection.Footer: Or you can %{link_start}confirm your account details%{link_end} %{muted_start}(this will take longer)%{muted_end}
phrases.airlock.online_profile_verification.auth: Failed to authenticate your online profile. Please try again.
phrases.airlock.online_profile_verification.head: Point us to an online profile
phrases.airlock.online_profile_verification.expl: In the real world, someone compares you to your photo ID to confirm a match. Since we can't see you in person, we need a secondary source of ID that you can provide online.
phrases.airlock.cvv_verification.title: Credit Card Verification
phrases.airlock.cvv_verification.response.title: Help us keep your account secure.
phrases.airlock.cvv_verification.response.descri: We want to confirm that it’s really you who’s trying to access your account. Please verify your identity by entering the security code from a credit card you used in the past.
phrases.airlock.cvv_verification.response.invali: Incorrect value entered! Please try again.
phrases.airlock.ocr_verification.introduction.de: We want to confirm that you are using your own credit card to book this accommodation. Please scan the physical card in  the next step.
phrases.airlock.photo_id_verification.title: Photo Id Verification
phrases.airlock.photo_id_verification.option_sel: When you stay in an Airbnb, you’re staying in someone’s home. Scanning your government ID helps your host feel more comfortable sharing their personal space.
phrases.airlock.photo_id_verification.response.i: Something went wrong while scanning your ID. Please try again.
phrases.airlock.captcha.thread_create.response.d: Sometimes, automated programs abuse websites and try to send fake message to others. Complete the prompt below to show you’re a real person who means to send this message.
phrases.airlock.captcha.response.invalid: Please try completing the prompt below again.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.multi_select_: Receive a call or text message
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.title: Phone Verification
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.listing_activ: We need you to confirm this change.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.payout_gibral: We need you to confirm this change.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.option_select: You can only select a phone number added more than 14 days ago.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.listing_activ: We want to confirm that it’s really you who’s trying to add a listing. To do that, we’ll send a code to a phone you’ve previously verified on Airbnb.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.payout_gibral: We want to confirm that it’s really you who’s trying to add a payout method. To do that, we’ll send a code to a phone you’ve previously verified on Airbnb.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.option_select: How should we send the code?

In a few minutes, you should receive a verification code to your
                              phone number ending in %{last_four_digits}. Once you do,
                              please enter this code to access your account.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.Depending on: Depending on your provider, it may take a few minutes to arrive.
phrases.airlock.api_error: Something went wrong while processing your request. Please try again.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification.response.inva: Looks like you entered the code incorrectly.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification_via_text.resp: Check your text message for the code
We sent a text message with the code to %{phone_number}. It may take a minute or two to arrive. If you don't get it, %{link_start}click here to resend%{link_end}.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification_via_call.resp: Check your phone for the code
We'll call you at %{phone_number} with the security code. It may take a minute or two to arrive. If you don't receive a call from us, %{link_start}click here to call you again%{link_end}.
phrases.airlock.phone_verification_or_email_veri: Help us keep your account secure.
We want to confirm that it’s really you who’s trying to access your account. To do that, we’ll send a security code to your phone, or send you a confirmation email.

You’ve indicated you are %{emphasis_start}%{smart_count} year old%{emphasis_end}. ||||You’ve indicated you are %{emphasis_start}%{smart_count} years old%{emphasis_end}.
phrases.airlock.password_reset.response.title: Let’s change your password.
phrases.airlock.password_reset.response.descript: Changing your password is an easy way to help keep your account secure. Let’s do that now.
phrases.airlock.email_code_verification.response: We sent an email with the code to %{user_email}. It may take a minute to arrive. If you haven’t received it, %{link_start}click here to resend%{link_end}.
Check your email for the code
phrases.airlock.aov.Footer Text.Contact us if no: Or %{link_start}contact us%{link_end} to verify your account (this may take longer).
phrases.airlock.email_verification.option_select: We’re going to send you an account verification email to: %{linebreak} %{user_email} %{linebreak} %{linebreak} If you have trouble receiving the email be sure to check your spam folder.
phrases.airlock.email_verification.response.desc: We just sent an email to %{linebreak} %{user_email} %{linebreak} %{linebreak} Once you confirm your email address, you’ll be on your way.
phrases.airlock.device_association_email_verific: To keep your account secure, we’re going to send you a device verification email to:  %{linebreak} %{user_email} %{linebreak} %{linebreak} If you have trouble receiving the email be sure to check your spam folder. %{linebreak} %{linebreak} To verify, please open the link on your current device’s browser.

We just sent a device confirmation email to%{linebreak} %{user_email}%{linebreak} %{linebreak} To verify your device, please open this link in your %{emphasis_start}current device’s browser%{emphasis_end}.
phrases.airlock.account_disabled.introduction.in: To help protect your information, we’ve temporarily blocked your Airbnb account.
phrases.airlock.account_disabled.introduction.de: To restore access, send an email to account.disabled@airbnb.com from an email address associated with your Airbnb account.
phrases.airlock.no_phone_access.introduction.tit: Send us an email to confirm your account
phrases.airlock.no_phone_access.introduction.int: For security reasons, having Airbnb manually confirm this change can take 1-2 days. Email us at <a href="mailto:account.disabled@airbnb.com">account.disabled@airbnb.com</a> from an address associated with your account and we’ll take it from there.
phrases.airlock.no_phone_access.introduction.tip: Make this update faster with your phone
If you’re traveling or your phone’s just out of reach, wait until you get it back and try to make this update again.
phrases.airlock.no_email_access.introduction.int: For security reasons, having Airbnb manually confirm this change can take 1-2 days. Email us at <a href="mailto:account.disabled@airbnb.com">account.disabled@airbnb.com</a> from an address associated with your account and we’ll take it from there.
phrases.airlock.no_email_access.introduction.tip: Make this update faster with your phone
If you’re traveling or your phone’s just out of reach, wait until you get it back and try to make this update again.
Thanks! We’re reviewing your account now
We’ll send you an email when your account is verified, or you can try accessing your account again in an hour.
phrases.airlock.contact_ticket.response.title: Check back later
phrases.airlock.contact_ticket.response.descript: We’re reviewing your account details as quickly as possible. We’ll send you a notification when you can access your account, or you can try again in an hour.
phrases.airlock.backup_verification_link.send_co: %{link_start}Send a code by phone or email instead%{link_end}
phrases.airlock.send_code_link.To quickly verify: To quickly verify your account, %{link_start}send a code%{link_end}
phrases.airlock.contact_us_form.option_selection: Tell us a little bit about what’s not working. Detailed info will help us resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
Enter details regarding the issue here
Your response needs to be between %{min_length} and %{max_length} characters.
phrases.airlock.contact_us_form.response.title: We’ll be in touch soon
phrases.airlock.contact_us_form.response.descrip: Someone from our team will respond directly to the email address associated with your account. You’ll be able to use your Airbnb account as usual once we’ve reviewed your account.
phrases.airlock.contact_us.response.title: Get help with your account
phrases.airlock.contact_us.response.description: We're sorry you're having trouble accessing your Airbnb account. Please email <a href="mailto:account.verify@airbnb.com">account.verify@airbnb.com</a> and include the email address and phone number associated  with your Airbnb account.
After we receive this information, someone from our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal.introduction.t: We need a little more information
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal.introduction.d: To keep the Airbnb community secure, we sometimes ask for additional payment verification. Please provide a billing statement to confirm that you’re authorized to use %{formatted_cc}. We will review your statement within 24 hours and let you know if you’re approved to continue booking. <a href="/help/article/1531" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal.response.title: Please upload your billing statement
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal.response.descr: Feel free to block out account balances, any non-Airbnb transactions, and account numbers as long as your full name and the last four digits are visible.
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal.response.accep: You can <a href="/help/article/1625" target ="_blank">find your statement</a> on your card issuer’s website and upload it as a photo or PDF file.
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal.response.uploa: Your image was more than 5mb. Try again with a smaller image.
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal_submitted.intr: Got it! Please sit tight while we review
We’ll email you know within 24 hours to let you know if you’re authorized to continue booking. There’s nothing else you need to do right now.
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal_under_review.i: We’re reviewing your billing statement for %{formatted_cc}. There’s nothing else you need to do right now.
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal_denied.introdu: After a thorough review, we were unable to verify your payment method. If you’d like to appeal this decision, please contact us at <a href="mailto:account.disable@airbnb.com">account.disable@airbnb.com
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal_android.introd: We need a little more information
To keep the Airbnb community secure, please confirm that you’re authorized to use %{formatted_cc}. If you choose to continue, we’ll need a card statement for this payment method.
phrases.airlock.chargeback_appeal_android.respon: Please continue in your web browser

In order to finish verifying your payment method, you will need to login and retry this booking in your web browser. After you resubmit your request to book, you will again be prompted to submit your card statement. Don’t worry, we’ll walk you through the process step-by-step.
phrases.airlock.contact_us_chargeback.response.d: To keep the Airbnb community secure, we sometimes ask for additional payment verification. Please email <a href="mailto:account.enable@airbnb.com">account.enable@airbnb.com</a> to receive further instructions on how to verify your payment method. <a href="/help/article/1531" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
phrases.airlock.contact_kba.response.confirm_det: Confirm the information on your account
phrases.airlock.contact_kba.response.confirm det: To verify your account, we’ll match the info you provide here with the info on your account.
To do this more quickly, you can %{link_start}send a code%{link_end} to your email or phone instead.
phrases.airlock.contact_kba.response.name: Name
phrases.airlock.contact_kba.response.What is the: What’s the name on your account?
What is the full phone number for:
What’s the birth date on your account?
phrases.airlock.contact_kba.response.Confirm the: Confirm the details of a payment method on your account
phrases.airlock.contact_kba.response.payment_met: This payment method won’t be charged
phrases.airlock.contact_kba.response.missing val: Please enter values for all the fields of the form.
phrases.airlock.micro_authorization.introduction: Verify your payment method in order to continue

To keep our community secure, some payments may need additional verification. We will place two temporary authorizations of $1.99 or less on your card. These authorizations usually appear instantly.<br/><a href="/help/article/1531/why-do-i-need-to-verify-a-payment-method?topic=222" target="_blank">Why do I need to verify a payment method?</a>
phrases.airlock.micro_authorization.response.tit: Enter the amounts authorized to card
phrases.airlock.micro_authorization.response.des: Look for two small, temporary authorizations labeled "Airbnb" on your card's account. The amounts will not be permanently charged to your card and will soon disappear.
phrases.airlock.micro_authorization.response.inv: The amounts were incorrect. Please try again.
Each amount must be $1.99 or less.
phrases.airlock.micro_authorization_failure.intr: For security reasons, you can no longer verify your card by confirming authorizations.
phrases.airlock.micro_authorization_exception.in: Failed to place authorizations on your card
Unfortunately, we were unable to issue authorizations on your card. We have to try another method to verify your card instead.
phrases.airlock.fake_inventory_appeal.introducti: We ask hosts to confirm a few details before they list a new space. You'll only need to do this once.
<a href="help/article/1237/how-does-providing-identification-on-airbnb-work" target="_blank">Why do I need to do this?</a>
phrases.airlock.fake_inventory_appeal.response.t: Upload a copy of your utility bill
phrases.airlock.fake_inventory_appeal.response.d: Take a photo or screenshot of a recent utility bill for this space. Your full name and address should be visible, but feel free to cover any other information that you don’t want to share.<br/><br/><a href="help/article/1237/how-does-providing-identification-on-airbnb-work" target="_blank">Why do I need to do this?</a>
phrases.airlock.fake_inventory_appeal.response.a: You can upload the utility bill as a photo or PDF file.
phrases.airlock.fake_inventory_appeal.response.u: Your image was more than 5MB. Try again with a smaller image.
Someone on our team will review the info you provided within 24 hours. As soon as they do, you’ll be able to start accepting reservations.
phrases.airlock.fake_inventory_appeal_under_revi: We’re reviewing your info. There’s nothing else you need to do right now.
phrases.airlock.photo_id_verification_for_fi_app: We ask hosts to confirm a few details before they list a new space. You’ll only need to do this once.
<a href="help/article/1237/how-does-providing-identification-on-airbnb-work" target="_blank">Why do I need to do this?</a>
Something went wrong while scanning your ID. Please try again.
phrases.airlock.introduction: In order to continue, we ask that you complete a few challenges.
phrases.airlock.success.You are done: You’re done! You can go back to what you were doing.
phrases.airlock.generic_error: Something went wrong with your request

phrases.fill_out_survey: We'd love it if you filled out this quick survey.
phrases.sojump_help_make_experience_better: Help us make your Airbnb experience better by answering a quick survey.
phrases.surveyair_feedback_sent: Feedback sent! Thanks for sharing your experience with us.
phrases.header.You Have X Wish List(s): You have %{smart_count} wish list||||You have %{smart_count} wish lists
phrases.your_trips.Error: Sorry, we can’t load trip updates right now. %{link_start}View Trips%{link_end}
phrases.priv.everyone_description: Visible to everyone and included on your public Airbnb profile.
phrases.priv.invite_only_description: Visible only to you and any friends you invite.
phrases.community_commitment.please_take_a_momen: Please take a moment to read this
phrases.community_commitment.caption_introductio: Whether it’s your first time using Airbnb or you’re one of our original travelers, please commit to respecting and including everyone in the Airbnb community. %{link_start}Learn more%{link_end}

As an Airbnb host, you’re responsible for welcoming people of all backgrounds, from the moment you’re considering a reservation to the moment you’re greeting guests for the first time. Please take time to read this commitment. %{link_start}Learn more%{link_end}
We’re asking all hosts to confirm their commitment to welcoming guests of all backgrounds. %{link_start}Learn more%{link_end}
phrases.community_commitment.i_agree_to_treat_ev: I agree to treat everyone in the Airbnb community—regardless of their race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, disability, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, or age—with respect, and without judgment or bias.
phrases.community_commitment.faq.what_happens_if: What if I decline the commitment?
phrases.community_commitment.faq.answer_to_what_: If you decline the commitment, you won’t be able to host or book using Airbnb, and you have the option to cancel your account. Once your account is canceled, future booked trips will be canceled. You will still be able to browse Airbnb but you won’t be able to book any reservations or host any guests.
phrases.community_commitment.faq.how_can_i_give_: How can I share feedback about the commitment or get more information?
phrases.community_commitment.view_help_page_to_f: You can also review our %{link_start}host resources%{link_end}, which cover frequently asked questions by hosts about Airbnb’s Nondiscrimination Policy.
phrases.community_commitment.declining_the_commi: Declining this commitment means that your Airbnb account will be canceled, and your future reservations will be canceled.
Declining this commitment means that you won’t have an Airbnb account, though you can still browse the site.
phrases.community_commitment.why_did_airbnb_crea: Why did Airbnb create this commitment?
phrases.community_commitment.important_step_towa: This commitment is an important step towards creating a global community where everyone can truly belong. Discrimination prevents hosts, guests, and their families from feeling included and welcomed, and we have no tolerance for it. Building an Airbnb where everyone can belong hinges on knowing that everyone in our community understands this mission and agrees to help us achieve it.
phrases.community_commitment.what_happens_to_my_: What happens to my future reservations if I decline?
phrases.community_commitment.your_future_reserva: Any future reservations will be canceled.
phrases.community_commitment.your_reservation_wi: Your reservation will be refunded according to the host’s cancellation policy.
phrases.community_commitment.future_reservations: Any future reservations will be canceled and your guests will receive a full refund.
phrases.community_commitment.if_booked_as_a_gues: If you booked as a guest, any future reservations will be canceled.
phrases.community_commitment.what_if_laws_restri: What if laws in my area restrict me from hosting certain guests?
phrases.community_commitment.please_post_legal_r: Please post about the restriction on your listing, but be clear that it is a legal requirement in your area and that you are complying with local law.
phrases.community_commitment.what_if_i_have_safe: As a host, what if I have safety concerns about accepting reservations from anyone?
phrases.community_commitment.if_you_host_shared_: If you will share your living spaces with a guest, you may make a unit available only to guests of your own gender.
phrases.community_commitment.you_may_turn_down_g: Under this policy, you may also turn down a guest for other reasons, just not on the basis of race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, sexual orientation, or age.
phrases.community_commitment.reflect_on_reasonin: In general, when considering a booking request, reflect on your reasoning to ensure that bias isn’t a factor.
phrases.community_commitment.can_i_decline_reser: Can I decline guests with disabilities if I don’t think my home is suitable for them?
phrases.community_commitment.tell_prospective_gu: In many cases, Airbnb hosts are not required to make their homes compliant with the standards set out in the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) . However, you can’t decline a guest based on any actual or perceived disability. You should do your best to provide accurate information about your home’s accessibility features (or lack of them), allowing for guests with disabilities to decide for themselves whether the home is appropriate to their individual needs.
phrases.community_commitment.what_if_i_change_my: What if I change my mind after declining?
phrases.community_commitment.we_will_send_you_in: Once your account has been canceled, we’ll send you information about how to reinstate it if you change your mind. You’ll still be required to accept the commitment.
phrases.community_commitment.you_can_sign_up_aga: Once your account has been canceled, you can always sign up again if you change your mind. You’ll still be required to accept the commitment.
phrases.generic_error.sorry_something_went_wrong: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
phrases.community_commitment.we_welcome_feedback: We welcome your feedback about your decision to decline.
phrases.community_commitment.although_your_accou: You can continue browsing the site, though.
phrases.must_log_in: You must log in to continue
phrases.log_in_to_save: Log in to save this to a Wish List.

phrases.shared.generic_tos_ndp_acceptance_2016: By clicking Sign up or Continue with, I agree to Airbnb’s %{terms_of_service_link}, %{payments_terms_link}, %{privacy_policy_link}, and %{nondiscrimination_policy_link}.

phrases.user.signup.validation.birthday.must be: To sign up, you must be 18 or older. Other people won’t see your birthday.

phrases.shared.china_transparency_signup_terms: If I am a resident of China, I will contract with Airbnb China, and my information will be stored and processed in accordance with Chinese laws, including privacy and information disclosure laws.
phrases.signup_tos.the panel title of the tos bo: To continue, please agree to the terms
phrases.error.To sign up, you must be 18 or olde: To sign up, you must be 18 or older.
phrases.users.remember_browser.message: We won't send you login notifications when youaccess your account from a trusted browser.
phrases.china.signup.fields.description.Birthdat: Airbnb will not share your birthday with any hosts or guests. Rest assured.
phrases.china.signup.fields.description.Receive: I’d like to receive coupons, promotions, surveys, and updates about Airbnb and its partners, via SMS and phone.

phrases.airlock.account ownership verification h: Help us keep your account secure
phrases.airlock.account ownership verification d: We want to confirm that it’s really you who’s trying to access your account. Please select one of the following ways to verify yourself.
phrases.airlock.email code verification intro ti: Send me a code by email
phrases.airlock.email code verification intro de: We’ll send a verification code to the email address on your account, %{email_address}.
phrases.airlock.password reset intro description: Changing your password is an easy way to help keep your account secure.
phrases.airlock.phone verification code input de: We sent a text message with the code to %{phone_number}.  It may take a minute or two to arrive.
phrases.airlock.phone verification call intro ti: Call my phone with a code
phrases.airlock.phone verification call code inp: We’ll call you at %{phone_number} with the security code. The call may take a minute or two to arrive.
phrases.airlock.phone verification intro descrip: You can only select a phone number added to your account more than 14 days ago.
phrases.airlock.verification continue with previ: You’re done! You can go back to what you were doing.
phrases.airlock.contact us form description: Tell us a little bit about what’s not working. Detailed info will help us resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
phrases.airlock.contact_us_form wrong character: Your response needs to be between %{min_length} and %{max_length} characters.
phrases.airlock.contact_us_form waiting for cont: Someone from our team will respond directly to the email address associated with your account. You’ll be able to use your Airbnb account as usual once we’ve reviewed your account.

phrases.cancellations.new_policy_flexible.head: This host has a %{highlight_start}Flexible Cancellation Policy%{highlight_end}
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_flexible.body: Cancel up to 24 hours before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 24 hours of the trip and the first night is non-refundable, with the exception of fees.
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_moderate.head: This host has a %{highlight_start}Moderate Cancellation Policy%{highlight_end}
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_moderate.body: Cancel up to 7 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 7 days of the trip and get a 50% refund of the nightly rate, as well as a full refund of fees.
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_strict.head: This host has a %{highlight_start}Strict Cancellation Policy%{highlight_end}
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_strict.body: Cancel up to 30 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 30 days of the trip and get a 50% refund of the nightly rate, as well as a full refund of fees.
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_super_strict_30: This host has a %{highlight_start}Super Strict 30 Cancellation Policy%{highlight_end}
Cancel up to 30 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 30 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable with the exception of fees.
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_super_strict_60: This host has a %{highlight_start}Super Strict 60 Cancellation Policy%{highlight_end}
Cancel up to 60 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 60 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable with the exception of fees.
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_long_term.head: This host has a %{highlight_start}Long Term Cancellation Policy%{highlight_end}
phrases.cancellations.new_policy_long_term.body: Cancel up to 30 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 30 days of the trip and your first month’s payment is non-refundable with the exception of fees. All reservations that are 28 nights or longer automatically use this Long Term policy.
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_f.head: Flexible
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_f.body: Cancel up to 24 hours before your trip and get a full refund, including service fees.
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_m.head: Moderate
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_m.body: Cancel up to 5 days before your trip and get a full refund, including service fees.
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_s.head: Strict
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_s.body: Cancel up to 7 days before your trip and get a 50% refund plus service fees back.
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_ss30.b: Cancel up to 30 days before your trip and get a 50% refund plus service fees back.
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_ss60.b: Cancel up to 60 days before your trip and get a 50% refund plus service fees back.
phrases.ncp_guest_update.p3_banner.policy_lt.bod: Your first month’s payment for a long term reservation is non-refundable. After that, cancellations require 30 days notice.

phrases.review_tags.preferences_modal.select_a_f: Select a few preferences for where you’d like to stay.
phrases.review_tags.preferences_modal.options_co: These options come from what other guests have said in their reviews.
phrases.review_tags.preferences_modal.upsell: Want a walkable neighborhood? Easy parking? Now you can sort your results based on what guests have said in reviews.
phrases.list_your_space.bedrooms_step.how_many_b: How many beds can guests use?
How many bedrooms can guests use?
phrases.listing_your_space.bedrooms_step.bed_det: Please add what kind of beds your place has.
phrases.list_your_space.bedrooms_step.bedrooms.e: A preview of your bed details will appear here.
phrases.list_your_space.bedrooms_step.bedrooms.h: The number and type of beds you have determines how many guests can stay comfortably.
phrases.list_your_space.bedrooms_step.bedrooms.b: Bed details help guests understand what the sleeping arrangements are like.
phrases.list_your_space.beddetails_step.beddetai: Adding details about what kind of beds you have will help guests understand what the sleeping arrangements are like.

phrases.flag_instructions: If so, please choose one of the following reasons.
phrases.report_listing_question: Do you want to anonymously report this listing?
phrases.report_user_question: Do you want to anonymously report this user?
phrases.report_review_question: Do you want to anonymously report this review?
phrases.thank_you_for_reporting_this_listing: Thanks for taking the time to report this listing.
phrases.thank_you_for_reporting_this_user: Thanks for taking the time to report this user.
phrases.your_participation_helps_and_we_apprecia: Your participation helps keep Airbnb a safe and trusted community, and it doesn’t go unnoticed!
phrases.flag_widget_user_suspicious_bad: This profile shouldn’t be on Airbnb
phrases.flag_widget_listing_suspicious_bad: This listing shouldn’t be on Airbnb
phrases.flag_widget_message_transact_offline: Attempt to pay or communicate outside Airbnb
phrases.flag_widget_user_suspicious_bad_details: This profile may belong to a scammer, criminal offender, or exist for other malicious purposes.
phrases.flag_widget_user_contact_info_details: There is an email address, phone number, or website address hidden in this profile.
phrases.flag_widget_user_inappropriate_spam_deta: The profile photos or description contain violent, graphic, promotional, or otherwise offensive content.
phrases.flag_widget_user_other_details: None of the above reasons apply.
phrases.flag_widget_listing_suspicious_bad_detai: This listing contains false information or may be a fake listing.
phrases.flag_widget_listing_not_a_home_details: This listing is a service, not an actual home.
phrases.flag_widget_listing_inappropriate_spam_d: The photos or description of this listing contain violent, graphic, promotional, or otherwise offensive content.
phrases.flag_widget_listing_other_details: None of the above reasons apply.
phrases.flag_widget_message_transact_offline_det: This person is attempting to share or request contact info before an accepted reservation.
phrases.flag_widget_message_website_solicitation: This message links to a website unaffiliated with Airbnb.
phrases.flag_widget_message_inappropriate_spam_d: This message contains violent, graphic, or otherwise offensive content.
phrases.flag_widget_message_hateful_content_deta: This message contains discriminatory or hateful content.
phrases.flag_widget_message_other_details: None of the above reasons apply.

phrases.superhost.profile_badge.host.tooltip: Congratulations, you're a Superhost! We'll reward you with priority support, product previews and more.

When you find something you like, click the heart icon to save it. If you’re planning a
            trip with others, invite them so they can save and vote on their favorites.

phrases.tooltip.instant_book_it.description: This place doesn’t require approval from the host before you book.
phrases.tooltip.superhost.description: %{host} represents the best in hospitality on Airbnb. You’re in good hands.
phrases.tooltip.business_travel_ready.descriptio: This private space has free WiFi, 24-hour check-in, and other business essentials.
phrases.tooltip.cancellation_policy_category.des: If your plans change, you can cancel this reservation up to 24 hours before check-in.
phrases.tooltip.kitchen.description: Space where guests can cook their own meals.
phrases.tooltip.free_additional_guests.descripti: Bring extra friends at no extra charge, up to the maximum capacity. Book now, worry about the guest list later.
phrases.tooltip.verified_photos.description: Photos are taken by an independent photographer, so the place will be just as you imagined it.
phrases.tooltip.free_parking.description: Off-street parking available at this place.
phrases.tooltip.pets_welcome.description: Traveling with a furry friend? This place allows pets.
phrases.tooltip.pool.description: Take a dip in a private or shared pool.
phrases.tooltip.wireless_internet.description: Stay plugged in. Without the plugs, of course.
phrases.business_ready_description: This listing has essential business travel amenities.
